item.title: 大型电池如何防止夏季停电
item.description:
随着创纪录的高温和可再生能源的到来，在得克萨斯州和整个中西部地区，储存电力可能会使情况大为改观。【原文：

With record heat and renewable energy on tap, socking away electricity could make all the difference in Texas and across the Midwest. 

】

item.title: 英国在热浪从西班牙向北蔓延之前发出健康警报
item.description: 本周晚些时候，热浪将袭击伦敦和英格兰南部，英国卫生部门已在此之前发出预警。【原文：UK health authorities have issued early warnings ahead of a heat wave that’s forecast to hit London and southern England later this week.】

item.title: 美国每年用于气候破坏的开支接近 1 万亿美元
item.description:
根据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的最新分析，气温升高造成的影响超过了美国国内生产总值的 3%。【原文：

The bill for impacts from rising temperatures exceeded 3% of US GDP, according to a new analysis by Bloomberg Intelligence. 

】

item.title: 欧洲央行修订银行资本审查以反映极端天气风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行正在将气候风险纳入对银行承受损失能力的定期审查中，这标志着其监管方法翻开了新的篇章。【原文：The European Central Bank is embedding climate risk into regular reviews of how well banks can absorb losses, marking a new chapter in its supervisory approach.】

item.title: 华为人工智能天气模型在中国测试中名列前茅
item.description: 中国气象局正在测试十多个人工智能模型，以提高预报能力，其中华为技术有限公司的一个系统显示出加速改善的迹象。【原文：China’s weather agency is testing more than a dozen artificial intelligence models in an effort to enhance its forecasting, with a system from Huawei Technologies Co. showing accelerated improvement.】

item.title: 澳大利亚新金融规则旨在加快减排步伐
item.description: 澳大利亚就有资格获得可持续融资的项目类型制定了新的指导方针，旨在加快对农业、采矿业和能源等污染性行业的减排投资。【原文：Australia set new guidelines on the types of projects eligible for sustainable finance, aiming to accelerate investment in emissions reduction in polluting industries like agriculture, mining and energy.】

item.title: 中国放宽电池和废钢进口规定，助力绿色发展
item.description: 中国正在放宽废钢进口规定，此举将支持电池金属的回收利用，并有助于加快钢铁市场的绿色转型。【原文：China is relaxing import regulations on scrap, a move that will support recycling of battery metals and help speed the green transition in the steel market.】

item.title: KKR 收购澳大利亚离网电力专家 Zenith Energy
item.description: KKR & Co. 已同意从 Pacific Equity Partners Pty Ltd.、OPSEU Pension Trust 和 Foresight Group Holdings Ltd. 等集团手中收购总部位于珀斯的离网电力系统供应商 Zenith Energy。【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to buy Zenith Energy, a Perth-based provider of off-grid power systems, from a group including Pacific Equity Partners Pty Ltd., OPSEU Pension Trust and Foresight Group Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 参议院共和党税收法案中的风能和太阳能抵免额将提前结束
item.description: 参议院共和党人公布了一项法案，该法案将比其他资源更早地终止对风能和太阳能的税收抵免，这使那些寻求从众议院通过的重大削减中解脱出来的人们的希望破灭了。【原文：Senate Republicans released a bill that would end tax credits for wind and solar earlier than for other sources, dashing hopes of those seeking relief from major cuts passed by the House.】

item.title: 伊比利亚暖流将肆虐英国大部分地区
item.description: 据预测，本周英国将迎来一阵温暖的天气，到周六，英国大部分地区可能会出现热浪。【原文：A blast of warm weather is forecast for UK this week, with much of the country facing a potential heat wave by Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普无法终结联邦紧急事务管理局，但奥巴马的联邦紧急事务管理局局长说它需要改革
item.description:
据该机构前负责人克雷格-福盖特（Craig Fugate）称，该机构 "从未打算 "做今天的工作。【原文：

The agency “was never intended” to do what it does today, according to its former chief Craig Fugate. 

】

item.title: 英国干旱蔓延至约克郡，水库进一步减少
item.description: 由于干旱天气进一步降低了水库和河流的水位，英国的旱情已经蔓延到约克郡。【原文：Drought conditions in the UK have spread to Yorkshire, as dry weather lowered water levels further in reservoirs and rivers.】

item.title: 全球食品公司都在努力实现甲烷减排目标
item.description:
星巴克、卡夫亨氏和其他公司在解决供应链中的有害气体排放问题方面进展缓慢。【原文：

Starbucks, Kraft Heinz and others are slow to address the potent emissions in their supply chains.

】

item.title: 拉扎德称太阳能比天然气更便宜，可为人工智能提供动力
item.description: 根据拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc）的分析，即使人工智能推动电力需求出人意料地激增，太阳能仍然是美国电网最廉价、最快速的电力来源。【原文：Solar remains the cheapest and fastest source of electricity for US grids, even as artificial intelligence drives an unexpected surge in power demand, according to an analysis by Lazard Inc.】

item.title: 私募股权投资改变南非能源市场
item.description: 在赢得全球最大的绿色基础设施投资者之一的支持仅两年后，一家鲜为人知的南非公司正在迅速重绘该国的能源版图。【原文：Just two years after winning the backing of one of the world’s biggest green infrastructure investors, a little-known South African company is rapidly redrawing the country’s energy map.】

item.title: 中国火力发电今年首次实现增长
item.description: 高温炙烤着中国部分地区，中国庞大的煤炭和天然气发电厂的发电量在 2025 年首次实现同比增长。【原文：China’s massive fleet of coal and gas power plants logged the first year-on-year gain in electricity generation for 2025 following blistering heat that baked parts of the country.】

item.title: 中国评估特朗普削减预算对美国数据限制的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）撤消了对一些美国机构的资助，并停止公布某些类别的数据，中国政府正在审查这一举动对中国科学研究的影响。【原文：China’s government is reviewing impacts on the nation’s scientific research after President Donald Trump’s moves to withdraw funding from some US agencies and halt publication of certain categories of data.】

item.title: 暴雨淹没刚果首都，造成至少 19 人死亡
item.description: 刚果金沙萨（美联社）— 刚果当局周六表示，刚果首都金沙萨的多个街区遭受严重洪灾，造成至少 19 人死亡和严重破坏。【原文：KINSHASA, Congo (AP) — Major flooding hit several neighborhoods in Congo's capital Kinshasa, killing at least 19 people and causing severe damage, authorities said Saturday.】

item.title: 鸡肉变燃料项目是最新违约的绿色小额债券
item.description: 密西西比州一家为帮助将家禽粪便转化为生物柴油而募集了 2200 万美元证券的设施出现了违约。这标志着本月至少有第二起绿色债券违约事件发生在市政债券市场。【原文：A Mississippi facility that raised $22 million in securities to help convert poultry waste into biodiesel has defaulted. That marks at least the second green bond default to hit the muni market this month.】

item.title: 特朗普削减联邦紧急事务管理局经费对飓风季节意味着什么？
item.description: 大西洋飓风季节于 6 月 1 日开始，预计今年将比往年更加活跃。在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统大幅削减联邦紧急事务管理局的救灾计划之后，繁忙的飓风季节将是对该局的考验。【原文：The Atlantic hurricane season started on June 1 and is predicted to be more active than usual this year. A busy hurricane season would test the Federal Emergency Management Agency in the aftermath of President Donald Trump’s dramatic cuts to its disaster programs.】

item.title: 特朗普计划提高生物燃料配额，寻求抑制外国供应
item.description: 特朗普政府建议炼油厂明年在汽油和柴油中掺入更多生物燃料，同时设法阻止使用进口供应。【原文：The Trump administration is proposing oil refiners blend more biofuels into gasoline and diesel next year while seeking to discourage the use of imported supplies.】

item.title: 大企业正在放弃其气候目标
item.description:
从亚马逊到富国银行，看看在气候承诺方面出现的严重倒退。【原文：

From Amazon to Wells Fargo, a look at rampant backsliding on climate pledges.

】

item.title: 中国限制稀土使用，印度对放宽电动汽车规定持开放态度
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在中国对稀土出口的限制使这一目标成为疑问之后，印度愿意放宽其对电动汽车制造商和供应商要求的50%本地化以换取激励措施。【原文：India is amenable to relaxing the 50% localization it expects from electric vehicle makers and suppliers in return for incentives, after China’s curbs on rare earths exports put the goal in doubt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合国海洋峰会努力防止海洋成为 "狂野西部
item.description: 今天的时事通讯关注本周在法国尼斯举行的联合国海洋大会的一些亮点。如需不受限制地获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：Today’s newsletter looks at some of the highlights from this week’s United Nations Ocean Conference in Nice, France. For unlimited access to climate and energy news, please subscribe.】

item.title: 欧洲央行高官称特朗普无法破坏气候议程
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一位高级官员表示，欧洲将气候风险纳入金融监管的决心不会因为特朗普政府的干预而偏离轨道。【原文：Europe’s determination to include climate risk in financial regulations won’t be thrown off track by the Trump administration’s interventions, according to a senior European Central Bank official.】

item.title: 气候投资基金批准 26 亿美元的南非煤炭退出计划
item.description: 一个与世界银行有联系的气候基金支持南非减少对煤炭依赖的计划，释放了高达 26 亿美元的资金，为该国的能源转型带来了意想不到的推动力。【原文：A World Bank-linked climate fund has backed South African plans to cut its reliance on coal, unlocking up to $2.6 billion in financing and giving the nation’s energy transition an unexpected boost.】

item.title: 房主就 2.9 万亿美元气候风险与保险公司交锋
item.description:
补贴是一种不断恶化的风险，保险公司不想承担这种风险。【原文：

Subsidence is a worsening risk and insurers don’t want to pick up the tab.

】

item.title: 顶级养老基金 GPIF 的日本环境、社会和公司治理主管据说将辞职
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，日本政府养老金投资基金 ESG 主管 Kenji Shiomura 将离职。【原文：The head of ESG at Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund, Kenji Shiomura, will leave the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Sunnova 获得 9000 万美元生命线以支持破产出售
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc.获得法院批准，开始动用一笔 9000 万美元的新破产贷款，这笔资金将帮助这家屋顶太阳能公司在破产保护程序中出售业务的同时继续维持运营。【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc. won court approval to start drawing on a new $90 million bankruptcy loan, funding that will help keep the rooftop solar company afloat while it sells its business in Chapter 11.】

item.title: 美国生物燃料制造商陷入低迷，等待特朗普政策出台
item.description: 白宫正在紧锣密鼓地准备最终宣布新的生物燃料混合规则，这是对过去二十年来支撑美国农业的重要支持。但对于一些以大豆为原料的柴油生产商来说，此举并不足以将他们从长达数月的低迷中解救出来，因为低迷已导致工厂倒闭和裁员。【原文：The White House is gearing up to finally announce its new rules on biofuel blending, critical support for the industry that’s underpinned American farming over the past two decades. But for some producers of diesel made from soybeans, the move won’t be enough to rescue them from a months-long downturn that’s led to plant closings and layoffs.】
